title: President Donald J. Trump Is Expanding Waivers for E15 and Increasing Transparency in the RIN Market â€“ The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Energy & Environment	

Issued on:
October 11, 2018
We want to eliminate the intrusive rules that undermine your ability to earn a living, and we will protect the corn-based ethanol and biofuels that power our country.
						President Donald J. Trump					EXPANDING WAIVERS FOR E15: The Trump Administration is initiating rulemaking to expand fuel waivers for E15, or gasoline containing 15 percent ethanol. INCREASING TRANSPARENCY IN THE RIN MARKET: In the same rulemaking, the Trump Administration will increase transparency in the Renewable Identification Number (RIN) market.
